contest-event.event-date:
June 6, 1960 D Daily Herald Brighton Open Brass Band Festival (Second Section)
Daily Herald Brighton Open Brass Band Festival (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Daily Herald Brighton Open Brass Band Festival daily-herald-brighton-open-brass-band-fe-2897
None
Dome Theatre, Brighton Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2ns £15 and trophy, 3rd £10.10s. 10 bands competed.
May 17, 2014, 7:21 a.m. April 6, 2021, 10:16 a.m.
1 Denham Brass George Cook Gallions Reach
2 Tadley Band Gideon West Egmont [arr. Ball]
3 Dartford & Erith Silver Albert Fredericks Gallions Reach
5 Swindon Pegasus Brass Cyril Winstone Scheherazade
7 Aldbourne Band Robert Barnes Gallions Reach
Unknown Result John Laing (Hendon) Band Donald Morrison Devon Fantasy
Unknown Result Vectis Brass R.H. Hayles Eine Kleine Nachtmusik
Unknown Result Luckett's Travel (Southsea) F. S. Monk Scheherazade
Unknown Result Fulham Brass Band George Scarfe Labour and Love
Unknown Result Haywards Heath Town R. C. Hanney Thames Valley Suite
Withdrawn Cable and Wireless Band Arthur Irons Land of the Ever Young
